The categiry :designated" means something else from "accused" - and H fits both.
Hezbollah is already included in the category of org. accused of terrorism. The new category of designated terror org. is pov because it gives more weight to the opinion of the US.
Revert addition of category. There is no evidence that Hezbollah has committed terrorism. Hezbollah can perhaps be indirectly related to acts of terror, but that's also true for the US or Israel.
